```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
##import data
gun_train = read.csv("../data/training.csv") %>% select(-c(X))
gun_test = read.csv("../data/test.csv") %>% select(-c(X))
```

```{r}
##fit model
lm_fit = lm(log_incident_rate ~ ., data = gun_train)
summary(lm_fit)
```

```{r}
## resulting RMSE is 0.8134264
linear_predictions = predict(lm_fit, newdata = gun_test)
linear_RMSE = sqrt(mean((linear_predictions - gun_test$log_incident_rate)^2))
linear_RMSE

sqrt(mean((mean(gun_train$log_incident_rate) - gun_test$log_incident_rate)^2))
```
